key_facts: Trillions of dollars are still invested in fossil fuel expansion.
Most oil and gas companies are developing new reserves.
The U.S. is a leading country in fossil fuel expansion.
Funding comes from government subsidies, banks, and investors.
Fossil fuel companies spend little on clean energy.
Companies promote clean energy while expanding fossil fuels.
Critics say banks enable fossil fuel growth.
Experts warn current investments threaten climate goals.
Net-zero emissions by 2050 may be unreachable without change.
